text: Joseph Bacon "Joe" Fraser, Jr. (January 26, 1926 - March 13, 2014) was an American real estate developer. He was a co-founder of the Sea Pines Company, along with his brother Charles E. Fraser and father General Joseph B. Fraser. He first developed Hilton Head Island into a popular destination. He was born in Hinesville, Georgia. Fraser died from natural causes on March 13, 2014 in Bluffton, South Carolina. He was 80 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Joseph Bacon Fraser, Jr. biography Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Real estate developers
title: Joseph Bacon Fraser Jr.
